attributes.action: Urge Israel to let Gaza children/women go to safe havens in Israel or West Bank
attributes.additional_details: Israel wants to eliminate Hamas after 7 Oct and the taking of hostages, however many of the 28000+ deaths in Gaza are children/women. Children should be given special protection under International Humanitarian Law. Temporary safe havens in Israel (outside Gaza) or in the West Bank for children/women will prevent suffering and is within IHL. Safe havens in Israel would not be a permanent displacement.  The UK (USA, EU, etc.) could persuade Israel to allow safe havens as they are supplying arms.
attributes.background: Urge Israel to allow temp safe havens in Israel (outside Gaza) for children/women. Israeli academics proposed safe havens in Israel for children/women/elderly/hosp. evac (The Guardian 1/11/23) run by UN/Red Cross; financed internationally; protected by IDF. Or escort children/women to the West Bank.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/655033
